listening_conversation.question_text: What did the girl do yesterday?
listening_conversation.explanation:
男性が「Where were you yesterday?（昨日どこにいたの？）」と尋ねたのに対し、女性は「I went to the doctor（医者に行った）」と答えています。
したがって、昨日彼女がしたことは「医者に行ったこと」です。他の選択肢は会話の内容と一致しません。

listening_conversation.question_text: What happened to Mark yesterday?
listening_conversation.explanation: Markが「I had a cold（風邪をひいていた）」と言っているため、昨日欠席していた理由は風邪です。他の選択肢は会話の内容と一致しません。

listening_conversation.question_text: What color shoes is the girl going to buy?
listening_conversation.explanation: 「I’ll get red ones（赤いのにする）」という発言から、赤いバスケットシューズを買うとわかります。

listening_conversation.question_text: Which skirt is $40?
listening_conversation.explanation: 「this blue skirt」への答えが「Forty dollars（40ドル）」なので、青いスカートが40ドルです。

listening_conversation.question_text: What is Mary’s problem?
listening_conversation.explanation: Maryは「I don’t have an umbrella（傘を持っていない）」と言っているため、雨の中で困っている理由がわかります。

choices.choice_text: She is late for a meeting.

listening_conversation.question_text: How much is the salad?
listening_conversation.explanation: サラダの値段は直接「It’s $5」と言われており、明確です。

listening_conversation.question_text: How will the man get home?
listening_conversation.explanation: 男性は「I’ll take a taxi（タクシーに乗る）」と言っているため、正解はタクシーです。

listening_conversation.question_text: Why was the girl worried?
listening_conversation.explanation: 彼女は「I forgot my pencil（鉛筆を忘れた）」と話しており、テストの日に文房具を忘れて不安になっていたことがわかります。

choices.choice_text: She didn’t study for a test.

listening_conversation.question_text: Where is their teacher from?
listening_conversation.explanation: 「She’s from New Zealand（ニュージーランド出身）」という直接的な答えがあります。

listening_conversation.question_text: What will they have for dinner?
listening_conversation.explanation: 母が最後に「OK」と言っているため、息子の提案「I want pizza!」が夕食に決まったことがわかります。

listening_conversation.question_text: Where did the boy go last night?
listening_conversation.explanation: 男の子は「My favorite band played（好きなバンドが演奏した）」と言っているので、昨夜コンサートに行ったことがわかります。

listening_conversation.question_text: Where is the book?
listening_conversation.explanation: 父親が「It’s on the sofa（ソファの上にある）」と言っているので、場所はソファです。

listening_conversation.question_text: What are they talking about?
listening_conversation.explanation: 会話の冒頭で「Mr. Gordon’s English class（ゴードン先生の英語の授業）」について話しており、楽しい授業だという話題になっているので英語の授業がテーマです。

listening_conversation.question_text: Why won’t they go to the zoo today?
listening_conversation.explanation: 母親が「No. It’s raining（雨が降っているから）」と言っているので、理由は天候です。

listening_conversation.question_text: Why doesn’t Julie want more spaghetti?
listening_conversation.explanation: ジュリーは「I want to eat dessert（デザートを食べたい）」と言っているので、これ以上スパゲッティを食べたくない理由はデザートを食べたいからです。

listening_conversation.question_text: What is the woman’s problem?
listening_conversation.explanation: 女性は「it’s broken（壊れている）」と言っているので、買ったランプが壊れていることが問題です。

listening_conversation.question_text: What is the girl’s father’s job?
listening_conversation.explanation: 女の子が「he’s a cook（料理人）」と答えているので、職業はコックです。

listening_conversation.question_text: When will they go to the movies?
listening_conversation.explanation: 土曜日の午後が都合が良いと女性が提案し、それに男性も同意しているので、映画に行くのは「On Saturday afternoon」です。

listening_conversation.question_text: Whose painting did Sally like?
listening_conversation.explanation: サリーは「I liked Sam’s painting」と言っているので、サムの絵が好きだったと明言しています。

listening_conversation.question_text: Why was Pete late?
listening_conversation.explanation: 「I slept too long（寝すぎた）」と言っているので、遅れた理由は寝坊です。

listening_conversation.question_text: How will Jill get to school?
listening_conversation.explanation: Jill が「I’m going to take the bus.」と言っているので、バスで通学するのが正解です。

listening_conversation.question_text: What is the man doing?
listening_conversation.explanation: 男性が「I’m looking for the Simpson Hotel」と言っているのでホテルを探しているのが正解です。

listening_conversation.question_text: Who called this afternoon?
listening_conversation.explanation: 母親が「Did your dad call this afternoon?」と尋ね、Ken が「Yes」と答えているので Ken’s father が正解です。

listening_conversation.question_text: Where is Angela from?
listening_conversation.explanation: Angela が「I’m from Mexico」と言っているので Mexico が正解です。

listening_conversation.question_text: How long are Bill’s badminton lessons?
listening_conversation.explanation: Bill が「Two hours」と答えているので 2 時間が正解です。

listening_conversation.question_text: How will the girl go to her uncle’s house?
listening_conversation.explanation: 「I’ll take the train」と言っているので列車で行くのが正解です。

listening_conversation.question_text: How much money did the boy win?
listening_conversation.explanation: 「I got $100」と言っているので 100 ドルが正解です。

listening_conversation.question_text: Why is the coach late?
listening_conversation.explanation: 「His car isn’t working」とあるので車が故障しているのが正解です。

listening_conversation.question_text: When does the game end?
listening_conversation.explanation: 「It ends at four o’clock」とあるので 4:00 が正解です。

listening_conversation.question_text: Where did the woman speak to her neighbor?
listening_conversation.explanation: 「I spoke to our new neighbor at the café」と言っているので At the café が正解です。

listening_conversation.question_text: What will they eat for lunch today?
listening_conversation.explanation: 最終的に「How about spaghetti?」に対して「OK」と答えているので Spaghetti が正解です。

listening_conversation.question_text: Who lives in Miami?
listening_conversation.explanation: 「He live[s] in Miami」と言っているので Brenda の祖父が正解です。

listening_conversation.question_text: What are they talking about?
listening_conversation.explanation: 「At the new Italian restaurant」と言っているので新しいレストランについて話しています。

listening_conversation.question_text: Who brought the cookies to the party?
listening_conversation.explanation: 「Simon brought those」と言っているので Simon が正解です。

listening_conversation.question_text: Where did the boy go yesterday?
listening_conversation.explanation: 「I went to the doctor」と言っているので To the doctor が正解です。

listening_conversation.question_text: When is the girl’s English speech contest?
listening_conversation.explanation: 「it’s this weekend」と言っているので This weekend が正解です。

listening_conversation.question_text: What time does the next train come?
listening_conversation.explanation: 「It comes at 9:00」と言っているので 9:00 が正解です。

listening_conversation.question_text: Why does the boy want to go to the library?
listening_conversation.explanation: 「I can see my favorite movie there」と言っているので映画を見るためです。

listening_conversation.question_text: What did the girl do when she went camping?
listening_conversation.explanation: 「we watched beautiful stars at night」と言っているので星を見たのが正解です。

listening_conversation.question_text: How is Jack feeling?
listening_conversation.explanation: 「I’m tired」と Jack が言っているので tired が正解です。

listening_passage.question_text:
M: Alice will play in a piano concert next Sunday. Alice is happy because her mother bought her a new dress to wear on stage.
What will Alice do next Sunday?
listening_passage.explanation: 「Alice will play in a piano concert next Sunday（アリスは来週の日曜日にピアノのコンサートで演奏します）」とあるので、正解は「Play in a concert（コンサートで演奏する）」です。新しいドレスは母が買ったものであり、ピアノのレッスンや母を手伝う話は出てきません。

listening_passage.question_text:
W: Shelly had a bad headache yesterday, so she stayed at home. This morning, she felt better, so she could go to work.
Why did Shelly stay at home yesterday?
listening_passage.explanation: Shellyは「頭痛（headache）」があったため、昨日は家にいました。他の選択肢にはそのような理由はありません。

listening_passage.question_text:
W: Anna likes camping. Last weekend, she went camping with some friends. She was sad because the weather was cloudy, and she couldn’t see the moon or the stars.
What did Anna do on the weekend?
listening_passage.explanation: Annaは「last weekend」に友達とキャンプに行ったと述べています。他の選択肢の内容は記述されていません。

choices.choice_text: She went to her friend’s house.

listening_passage.question_text:
M: Last summer, I went to India. I liked the food very much, and I enjoyed learning about Indian culture. Now, I want to study about India in college.
What is the man talking about?
listening_passage.explanation: 話し手はインドへの旅行について話しています。「I went to India」と過去の旅行を語っているため、正解は「His trip」です。

listening_passage.question_text:
W: I like the color red. I have many red shirts and shoes. This weekend, I’ll go shopping and get a red bag.
What is the girl talking about?
listening_passage.explanation: 女の子は「赤」が好きで、赤い服や靴を持っていて、赤いバッグを買う予定と述べています。つまり「Her favorite color」が正解です。

listening_passage.question_text:
M: I want to fly to Spain this summer, but the ticket is $2,000. That’s too expensive. I should fly to London. It’s only $1,500.
How much is the ticket to Spain?
listening_passage.explanation: スペイン行きのチケットの価格は「$2,000」と明記されています。

listening_passage.question_text:
M: I’m sad because my sister broke her arm. She went to the doctor last week. She will stay home this weekend.
Why is the boy sad?
listening_passage.explanation: 「I’m sad because my sister broke her arm」という発言から、妹が腕を骨折したことが理由であることが分かります。

choices.choice_text: He had to stay at home.

listening_passage.question_text:
M: I often eat Chinese food on the weekend. Last weekend, I went to a Mexican restaurant. It was delicious. Next Saturday, I want to eat at an American restaurant.
Where does the man want to eat next Saturday?
listening_passage.explanation: 次の土曜日は「American restaurant」に行きたいと明言しているため、それが正解です。

listening_passage.question_text:
W: My family likes music. I play the violin, and my brother plays the drums. Our parents both play the guitar. I also want to learn the piano.
What does the girl play?
listening_passage.explanation: 彼女自身が「I play the violin」と言っているので正解は「The violin」です。ピアノは「学びたい」とあるだけで、まだ弾いていません。

listening_passage.question_text:
M: I missed the 9:00 a.m. train to Tokyo, so I had to take the 9:30 a.m. train. However, I wasn’t late for my soccer practice at 11:00 a.m.
What time did the man take the train?
listening_passage.explanation: 「I missed the 9:00 a.m. train... I had to take the 9:30 a.m. train」と述べているので、乗ったのは9:30の電車です。

listening_passage.question_text:
M: Andy went to a concert with two friends. The concert was four hours long. Andy was tired, but he had fun.
How long was the concert?
listening_passage.explanation: 会話に「The concert was four hours long（コンサートは4時間でした）」とあるため、正解は「Four hours」です。他の選択肢は会話の内容と一致しません。

listening_passage.question_text:
W: Megan is busy because she’ll go on a trip tomorrow. Today, she has to go shopping after work and clean her house tonight.
What will Megan do tomorrow?
listening_passage.explanation: 「She’ll go on a trip tomorrow（彼女は明日旅行に行きます）」とあるため、正解は「Go on a trip」です。買い物や掃除は今日する予定のことです。

listening_passage.question_text:
M: My family has a pet dog. My mom and I play with him a lot, and my dad gives him food every day.
Who gives food to the dog every day?
listening_passage.explanation: 「my dad gives him food every day（私の父が毎日餌をあげています）」とあるため、正解は「The boy’s father.」です。

listening_passage.question_text:
W: Laura usually makes her lunch and eats it at a park near her office. But yesterday was her friend’s birthday, so they ate at a restaurant.
Where does Laura usually eat lunch?
listening_passage.explanation: 「eats it at a park near her office（オフィスの近くの公園で食べる）」とあるため、正解は「At a park」です。レストランで食べたのは昨日だけです。

listening_passage.question_text:
W: Julie went shopping. She saw a nice red shirt, but it was too small. The store also had blue and white shirts. Julie bought a white one.
Which shirt was too small?
listening_passage.explanation: 「a nice red shirt, but it was too small（赤いシャツは小さすぎた）」とあるため、正解は「The red one」です。

listening_passage.question_text:
M: Yesterday was Ray’s birthday. His mother gave him a sweater, and his father gave him a bike. He got a comic book from Helen.
What did Helen give to Ray?
listening_passage.explanation: 「He got a comic book from Helen（ヘレンからはマンガ本をもらった）」とあるため、正解は「A comic book」です。

listening_passage.question_text:
M: Every morning, I get up at 6:00. I get dressed, and then I eat breakfast at 6:30. I leave for school at 7:15, and I get there at 7:30.
What time does the boy eat breakfast?
listening_passage.explanation: 「I eat breakfast at 6:30（6時30分に朝ごはんを食べます）」とあるため、正解は「At 6:30」です。

listening_passage.question_text:
M: On Monday afternoon, Mr. Tanaka’s students will study English. They will have an art class on Wednesday afternoon, and on Friday afternoon, they will take a test.
When will the students have an art class?
listening_passage.explanation: 「They will have an art class on Wednesday afternoon（美術の授業は水曜の午後）」とあるため、正解は「On Wednesday」です。

listening_passage.question_text:
W: Ian didn’t go to school today. His mother had a baby last night, so he went to the hospital with his father today.
Where did Ian go today?
listening_passage.explanation: 「he went to the hospital with his father today（父と一緒に病院へ行った）」とあるため、正解は「To the hospital」です。

listening_passage.question_text:
W: Marsha usually plays tennis on Saturdays. This weekend, it will rain, so Marsha will play video games at home with her brother.
What will Marsha do this weekend?
listening_passage.explanation: 「Marsha will play video games at home with her brother（ビデオゲームを兄と家で遊ぶ）」とあるため、正解は「Play video games」です。テニスは天気のためにできません。

listening_passage.question_text:
M: My brother is a musician. He plays the guitar. He started to play the guitar when he was five. Now, he’s in a rock band.
What is the boy talking about?
listening_passage.explanation: 「My brother is a musician」と兄について話しているので、正解は4です。

listening_passage.question_text:
M: I study Spanish at school. Last summer, I went to Spain and stayed with a host family. I’m excited because they’ll visit me this winter.
Why is the boy excited?
listening_passage.explanation: 「they’ll visit me this winter」とあるので、正解は3です。

choices.choice_text: His host family will visit him.

listening_passage.question_text:
W: My mother’s birthday is tomorrow. I want to buy her something. She doesn’t like cakes or books, so I’ll get some flowers for her.
What will the girl buy for her mother?
listening_passage.explanation: 「She doesn’t like cakes or books, so I’ll get some flowers for her」と述べているため正解は3です。

listening_passage.question_text:
M: David has to see the doctor today. He can’t go in the morning, so he’ll see the doctor in the afternoon, after lunch.
When will David go to the doctor?
listening_passage.explanation: 「he’ll see the doctor in the afternoon」とあるので正解は2です。

listening_passage.question_text:
M: There was a parade in town yesterday. My parents took me, but there were too many people. I couldn’t see anything.
What was the boy’s problem?
listening_passage.explanation: 「I couldn’t see anything」と述べているので正解は1です。

listening_passage.question_text:
W: I’m going to walk to the bookstore. It’s near the bus stop and the train station. I can walk there easily. It takes about 10 minutes.
How will the woman go to the bookstore?
listening_passage.explanation: 「walk to the bookstore」とあるので正解は2です。

listening_passage.question_text:
M: I want vegetables for a salad. A tomato is $1, and carrots are $2 for a kilogram. I’ll buy three tomatoes and five carrots.
How much is a tomato?
listening_passage.explanation: 「A tomato is $1」と書かれているので正解は1です。

listening_passage.question_text:
W: My friend Jessie is from Mexico, and she speaks Spanish. I want to talk to her more, so I want to study Spanish.
Why does the girl want to study Spanish?
listening_passage.explanation: 「I want to talk to her more」と述べているので正解は3です。

listening_passage.question_text:
M: In the winter, my brother and I snowboard. We like to snowboard on Tuesdays. There are too many people at the mountain on Saturdays and Sundays.
When does the boy go snowboarding?
listening_passage.explanation: 「We like to snowboard on Tuesdays」とあるので正解は1です。

listening_passage.question_text:
W: Thank you for waiting. The plane at Gate 5 is ready now. Please bring your tickets to the gate.
Where is the woman talking?
listening_passage.explanation: 「The plane at Gate 5 is ready」とあるため空港が正解です。

listening_passage.question_text:
M: I have an older brother. He plays rugby. I’m going to join a sports club next month because I want to be as strong as my brother.
What will the boy do next month?
listening_passage.explanation: 「I’m going to join a sports club next month」と言っているので Join a sports club が正解です。

listening_passage.question_text:
W: Class, we’re going to go to the zoo tomorrow. Please bring your lunch and don’t forget to wear a hat. It’ll be hot and sunny.
What is the woman talking about?
listening_passage.explanation: 「We’re going to go to the zoo tomorrow」とあるので A trip to the zoo が正解です。

listening_passage.question_text:
W: I like to walk my dog every day. Sometimes we walk to the river, and sometimes we walk to the bridge. But today, we’re going to walk to my friend’s house.
Where will the girl walk her dog today?
listening_passage.explanation: 「today, we’re going to walk to my friend’s house」とあるので 2 が正解です。

listening_passage.question_text:
M: Good afternoon, customers. This week, we’re having a sale on basketballs and soccer balls. On the weekend, tennis and badminton rackets will be on sale, too.
Where is the man talking?
listening_passage.explanation: 「This week, we’re having a sale」と言っているので At a sports store が正解です。

listening_passage.question_text:
W: Last July, I went to Rome. I went shopping, and I also went to some museums. Next year, I want to visit London.
What does the woman want to do next year?
listening_passage.explanation: 「Next year, I want to visit London」とあるので Go to London が正解です。

listening_passage.question_text:
W: Some of my friends have pets. Lucy has a white dog, and Bob has two brown cats. I like Tom’s black rabbit. They are all cute.
Whose pet is black?
listening_passage.explanation: 「Tom’s black rabbit」と言っているので Tom’s が正解です。

listening_passage.question_text:
M: Every year, on John’s birthday, his mother cooks dinner, and his father makes a cake. He always feels happy on his birthday because he can have a birthday party at home.
Why does John always feel happy on his birthday?
listening_passage.explanation: 「because he can have a birthday party at home」と言っているので 1 が正解です。

choices.choice_text: He can have a party at home.

listening_passage.question_text:
M: Tim and his friend were at the park. They got hungry, so they went to a café near there. They stayed there for two hours because it started raining.
Why did Tim go to the café?
listening_passage.explanation: 「They got hungry, so they went to a café」とあるので 1 が正解です。

listening_passage.question_text:
W: Akira bought a magazine this morning. He enjoyed reading it before dinner. He didn’t do this after dinner because he studied then.
When did Akira read a magazine?
listening_passage.explanation: 「He enjoyed reading it before dinner」とあるので 3 が正解です。

listening_passage.question_text:
M: There is a new bookstore near my house. There are many kinds of books in the store. After school, I often go there to buy some comic books.
What is the boy talking about?
listening_passage.explanation: 「There is a new bookstore near my house」と言っているので Bookstore が正解です。

listening_illustration.explanation:
男性が「What time shall we meet?（何時に会おうか？）」と聞いているので、時間に関する答えが正解です。
選択肢1の「Around ten（10時ごろ）」が自然な返答になります。
選択肢2（お金の額）や3（日数）は、時間に対する答えとして不適切です。

男性が「Do you have any shirts on sale?（セールのシャツはありますか？）」と尋ねているので、場所を示して案内する返答が自然です。
選択肢1の「Yes, over there（はい、あちらにあります）」が適切な答えです。
選択肢2「Sure, that’s mine.（もちろん、それは私のです）」は意味が通じず不自然、
選択肢3「Fine, thank you.（元気です、ありがとう）」も会話の流れと合いません。

「Shall I carry it for you?（持ってあげようか？）」という申し出に対し、
「自分でできます」という1の返答が自然です。2と3は文脈に合いません。

「魚に何を添える？」という質問に対して、
ご飯とサラダという食べ物を挙げている2が適切です。1と3は文脈にそぐいません。

listening_illustration.correct_answer: When I was two years old.
listening_illustration.explanation:
「いつ箸を使い始めたのか？」という質問に、
年齢で答える3が自然です。他の選択肢は的外れです。

choices.choice_text: When I was two years old.

listening_illustration.explanation:
「誰とテニスをしますか？」という質問に対して、
人を答える3が正解です。1と2は質問の内容に合いません。

「バスに乗る？」という提案に、「歩こう」と答える1が自然です。
2と3は文脈がずれています。

「いつ彼女に会えますか？」という未来の質問には、
「休暇のあと」と未来形の2が適切です。1は過去、3は会話の流れと合いません。

「なぜカメラを持っていくのか？」という質問には、
「写真を撮るため」と目的を答える3が自然です。1と2は不適切です。

「もらっていい？」に対して「どうぞ、一冊持っていって」が自然な返答です。
2と3は質問に答えていません。

女性が「Who made it?（誰が作ったの？）」と質問しているため、答えは「I did（私が作った）」が自然です。
選択肢1「It’s hot（辛い／熱い）」や選択肢2「Twenty dollars（20ドル）」は、質問の内容と合っていないため不適切です。

listening_illustration.correct_answer: Sorry, we only have orange juice.
listening_illustration.explanation: 「Do you have apple juice?（リンゴジュースはありますか？）」という質問には、飲み物の在庫に関する返答が自然です。選択肢1が適切です。他の選択肢は会話の内容に合いません。
母親が急いでと言っているため、「今行きます」という意味の選択肢2が自然です。他の選択肢は場面と合っていません。
相手が自分より早く起きたことに対しての反応として「早いね」という選択肢3が自然です。他の選択肢は質問とつながりません。
「高校を卒業した後何をするか」という質問に対する直接的な返答が選択肢2です。選択肢1と3は文脈に合いません。
行けない理由として「ピアノのレッスンがある」が自然な返答です。他の選択肢は理由として不十分です。
店が閉まることに対して「急がなきゃ」と言う選択肢1が適切です。他の選択肢は話の流れと合いません。
「どれくらいかかる？」という時間に関する質問なので、「約20分」という選択肢2が正しいです。1と3は質問とずれています。
自分の物が見つかったときに感謝を述べるのが自然なので、選択肢3が最適です。
助けを申し出られての感謝を表す選択肢1が自然です。他の選択肢は場面と合いません。
「What are you going to do?」に対して予定を伝える2が適切です。
「It’s really cute!」に「I think so, too.」と返すのが自然です。
頻度を聞く質問には「Every day（毎日）」が適切です。
「What happened?」への返答として2が自然です。
メニューを聞いた後、注文する2が適切です。
授業について「退屈だった」と答える1が適切です。
「What should I get?」に対して「We need more sugar」が自然です。

listening_illustration.correct_answer: OK. We can watch another one.
listening_illustration.explanation: 「もう見た」と言われた後、別の映画を提案する1が適切です。
「How do you know her?」に対して関係を説明する2が自然です。
「緑のペンが必要」と言われて「取ってくるよ」と言う1が自然です。
高いと話しているので「別の店に行こう」が自然な応答です。
新しい仕事を得たので「とてもワクワクしている」が自然な応答です。
「少し欲しい」に対して「はい、どうぞ」が適切です。
「シーフードを食べましたか」に対して「はい、美味しかった」が自然です。
「どうだった？」に対して感想を述べる「楽しかった」が適切です。
「何個必要ですか？」に対して「4個か5個用意しよう」が適切です。
「頑張ってね」に対して「頑張るよ」が自然です。
「一緒に写っている人は誰？」への答えとして「叔母と叔父」が適切です。
「どうだった？」に「楽しかった」が自然な返答です。
「何をする予定？」に対して「いとこを訪ねる」が正しい返答です。

reading_comprehension.text:
Summer Camp
There will be a camping trip for students in August.

When: August 12-14
Where: Ruess River Camp

Students will go fishing and learn about the trees and flowers around the river.

We will meet in front of the school and go to the camp by bus.

If you are interested, talk to Ms. Wilson before June 3.

questions.question_text: What will students do at the camp?
questions.explanation: 本文に「Students will go fishing and learn about the trees and flowers」とあり、釣りをすることが書かれています。写真を撮る、バスを掃除する、木に登るとは書かれていません。

questions.question_text: Where will the students meet?
questions.explanation: 本文に「We will meet in front of the school」と書かれているので、集合場所は学校の前です。Ms. Wilsonの部屋やバス停、川ではありません。

reading_comprehension.text:
From: Amy Simmons
To: Greg Harris
Date: May 12
Subject: My watch

Dear Coach Harris,

At basketball practice today, I took off my watch. I always put it in my bag before practice because I don’t want to break it. However, my watch wasn’t in my bag when I got home! I need it tomorrow afternoon because I’ll take a test. Did I leave my watch in the gym?

Thank you,
Amy

-

From: Greg Harris
To: Amy Simmons
Date: May 12
Subject: Your watch

Hello Amy,
I found your watch on a bench in the gym. I took it to the school office, so you can go there and get it. The office is closed now. It'll open at 8:00 a.m. tomorrow. The office is always busy at lunchtime, so you should go there tomorrow morning. See you soon, Coach Harris

questions.question_text: What will Amy do tomorrow afternoon?
questions.explanation: Amyのメールの中に「I need it tomorrow afternoon because I’ll take a test」とあり、試験を受ける予定だと書かれています。バスケットボールをしたり、新しい時計を買ったり、Coach Harrisに会ったりするとは書かれていません。

questions.question_text: Where did Coach Harris find Amy’s watch?
questions.explanation: Coach Harrisのメールに「I found your watch on a bench in the gym」と書かれています。オフィスに持っていったのはその後のことなので、見つけた場所はジムです。

questions.question_text: Amy should go to the school office
questions.explanation: Coach Harrisは「The office is always busy at lunchtime, so you should go there tomorrow morning」とアドバイスしています。したがって、明日の朝が一番良い時間です。

reading_comprehension.text: Fun at the Beach Jill is from a big city in Canada. Every summer, she visits the beach with her family. She enjoys swimming there. One day last summer, she also went fishing with her father. They got up at six in the morning and got on a boat at seven. They went fishing for four hours, but they didn’t catch any fish. Jill didn’t like fishing. The next day, Jill went for a walk by the beach at noon. She met a woman with long hair there. Jill asked her, “Do you like fishing?” The woman said, “No, but I love surfing.” Jill wanted to try surfing. The woman said, “You should take surfing lessons first.” Last fall, Jill went to college. At college, she started taking surfing lessons. Her first lesson was in the college swimming pool. Now, Jill has a lesson every week. This summer, she will take a trip with her friends. They will go surfing in the sea.

questions.question_text: What does Jill do every summer?
questions.explanation: 本文の最初に「Every summer, she visits the beach with her family.」とあり、毎年夏にビーチに行くのが習慣であることが書かれています。釣りやボート旅行、プールは特定の出来事なので不正解です。

choices.choice_text: She goes to the swimming pool.
She goes on a boat trip.

questions.question_text: What time did Jill and her father get on a boat?
questions.explanation: 本文に「They got up at six in the morning and got on a boat at seven.」と明確に書かれています。6時ではなく、7時が正解です。

questions.question_text: Who did Jill meet by the beach?
questions.explanation: 「She met a woman with long hair there.」と書かれています。父の友人やコーチではなく、「髪の長い女性」と明確です。

choices.choice_text: A man from a big city.

questions.question_text: What did Jill do at college?
questions.explanation: 本文に「At college, she started taking surfing lessons.」とあるため正解です。泳ぎを学ぶことや掃除、釣りクラブについては書かれていません。

choices.choice_text: 4, She cleaned the pool every week.

questions.question_text: What will Jill do this summer?
questions.explanation: 最後の文に「This summer, she will take a trip with her friends.」と明記されています。新しいボートを買ったり、仕事をしたりするとは書かれていません。

choices.choice_text: Take a trip with her friends.

reading_comprehension.text:
Fashion Show

See clothes made by students from the Fairview Fashion School.

Where: Arts Center
When: Saturday, June 10, 10:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m.

From 10:00 a.m., the students will show their clothes. In the afternoon, you can talk to the students. You can have lunch at the Garden Restaurant. It is open from 11:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m.

questions.question_text: When will the students show their clothes?
questions.explanation: 本文に「From 10:00 a.m., the students will show their clothes.」とあるので、服を披露するのは10時からです。他の時間帯は該当しません。

questions.question_text: In the afternoon, people can
questions.explanation: 午後には「you can talk to the students」とあり、生徒たちと話すことができます。服作りや料理、歴史については記載されていません。

choices.choice_text: talk to students from the Fairview Fashion School.
learn about the history of the Arts Center.

reading_comprehension.text:
From: Ben Taylor 
To: Graham Taylor
Date: May 5
Subject: Golf

HI Grandpa,
How are you? I watched golf on TV last week with Mom. It was very interesting. You can play golf, right? Can you teach me? I have soccer practice every Saturday and piano lessons every Sunday morning. I do my homework on Sunday evenings, but I'm always free on Sunday afternoons.
Thanks!
Ben

- 

From: Graham Taylor
To: Ben Taylor
Date: May 6
Subject: Of course

HI Ben,
Yes, I can teach you! How about next Sunday? I'll meet you after your piano lesson. We can go to the City Golf Course. I'll bring some sandwiches and some drinks for lunch. You should bring an umbrella. You'll need it if it rains.
See you on Sunday!
Grandpa

questions.question_text: What did Ben do last week?
questions.explanation: Benは「I watched golf on TV last week with Mom.」と書いており、ゴルフをテレビで見たことがわかります。他の選択肢は本文に記載されていません。

choices.choice_text: He had lunch with his mother.

questions.question_text: Every Sunday morning, Ben
questions.explanation: Benは「piano lessons every Sunday morning」と書いています。サッカーは土曜日、宿題は日曜の夜、祖父への電話は記載されていません。

questions.question_text: What should Ben bring next Sunday?
questions.explanation: Grandpaは「You should bring an umbrella.」と書いており、Benが持っていくべきものは傘です。サンドイッチと飲み物は祖父が用意します。

reading_comprehension.text:
A Fun Trip

Wendy is very busy. She does homework every day, and she has many hobbies. She takes piano lessons on Wednesday evenings, and she plays baseball every Saturday. During vacations, she spends time with her parents.

Last summer, Wendy and her parents stayed on a farm in the mountains for eight days. It took five hours to get there by car. There were 600 sheep on the farm. Wendy and her parents took care of the sheep with the farmer.

During their trip, they woke up at seven o'clock. Every morning, Wendy and her mother gave food to the sheep. Wendy's father cooked breakfast for everyone.

When Wendy came home, she told her grandfather about it. She said, "Helping on the farm was fun!" She showed her grandfather some photos of the farm. Her grandfather put the photos in a photo album for her. Wendy likes looking at the photos because she really enjoyed her trip to the farm.

questions.question_text: What does Wendy do every day?
questions.explanation: 本文冒頭に「Wendy is very busy. She does homework every day.」とあるように、彼女は毎日宿題をしています。ピアノや野球は週に数回です。

choices.choice_text: She watches sports with her parents.

questions.question_text: Where did Wendy and her parents go last summer?
questions.explanation: 「Wendy and her parents stayed on a farm in the mountains」とあるので、彼らは山の中の農場に行ったことがわかります。

questions.question_text: What time did Wendy and her parents wake up during their trip?
questions.explanation: 「During their trip, they woke up at seven o'clock.」と本文に明記されています。

questions.question_text: What did Wendy and her mother do every morning during their trip?
questions.explanation: 「Every morning, Wendy and her mother gave food to the sheep.」と書かれています。朝食を作ったのは父親です。

choices.choice_text: They gave food to the sheep.
They talked to the farmer's children.

questions.question_text: Why does Wendy like looking at the photos?
questions.explanation: 「Wendy likes looking at the photos because she really enjoyed her trip to the farm.」と本文にそのまま書かれています。他の選択肢は本文にありません。

reading_comprehension.text:
Dance Lesson for Junior High School Students

There will be a dance lesson at City Sports Center.  
Date: Saturday, October 25  
Time: 9:30 a.m. to 3:00 p.m.  
Cost: $5

Fifteen students can take a dance lesson from a professional dancer.  
Students must bring lunch and gym shoes.  
There will be a party at the end of the lesson.

questions.question_text: Where will the dance lesson be?
questions.explanation: 「There will be a dance lesson at City Sports Center」とあるので4が正解。

questions.question_text: What should the students do to take the dance lesson?
questions.explanation: 「Students must bring lunch and gym shoes」とあるので1が正解。

choices.choice_text: Tell a friend about the party.

reading_comprehension.text:
From: Beth Hamilton  
To: Cathy Jones  
Date: May 15  
Subject: Weekend plans

Hi Cathy,  
Thank you for inviting me to your house this weekend!  
I’m excited about going hiking on Saturday afternoon and having a barbecue on Saturday evening.  
What should we do on Sunday?  
Also, does it rain a lot in your town? Should I bring an umbrella?  
I can’t wait to see you.  
Beth

-

From: Cathy Jones  
To: Beth Hamilton  
Date: May 16  
Subject: This weekend

Hi Beth,  
We can go to the festival in my town on Sunday.  
We can also go and watch a movie on Sunday evening.  
What do you think?  
The weather will be hot and sunny all weekend, so you should bring your cap.  
You’ll need it when we go hiking.  
Cathy

questions.question_text: What will Beth and Cathy do on Saturday evening?
questions.explanation: Bethのメールに「having a barbecue on Saturday evening」とあるので4が正解。

questions.question_text: What will happen in Cathy’s town this Sunday?
questions.explanation: Cathyのメールに「We can go to the festival in my town on Sunday」とあるので1が正解。

choices.choice_text: A new movie theater will open.
A clothes store will have a sale.

questions.question_text: What should Beth bring this weekend?
questions.explanation: 「you should bring your cap」とあるので3が正解。

reading_comprehension.text:
The School Performance

Gerald enjoys playing the trumpet. He practices every day after school.  
His father plays the guitar in a band with a violin player and a pianist.  
The band plays at a nice restaurant every week. Gerald wants to become a musician like his father.

In May, Gerald saw a poster about a music performance for a school festival.  
The festival was in July. Gerald’s friend, Jessica, said,  
“You should play your trumpet at the festival!”  
Gerald decided to perform. In June, he practiced very hard.

At the festival, Gerald played one song. Many students and his parents were watching him.  
He was nervous, and he played the song too quickly.  
He thought, “I didn’t play well。」

However, the audience enjoyed Gerald’s performance.  
Jessica said, “Great job!”  
His father said, “You played so well!”  
Gerald was surprised. He became happy about his performance.  
After the performance, he went to a pizza restaurant with Jessica and his parents to celebrate.

questions.question_text: What does Gerald’s father play?
questions.explanation: 「His father plays the guitar」とあるので1が正解。

questions.question_text: What does Gerald want to do?
questions.explanation: 「Gerald wants to become a musician like his father」とあるので3が正解。

questions.question_text: When did Gerald see the poster?
questions.explanation: 「In May, Gerald saw a poster」とあるので1が正解。

questions.question_text: During the performance at the festival, Gerald was
questions.explanation: 「He was nervous, and he played the song too quickly」とあるので1が正解。

questions.question_text: What did Gerald do after the performance?
questions.explanation: 「After the performance, he went to a pizza restaurant with Jessica and his parents」とあるので4が正解。

reading_comprehension.text:
Winter Festival  
When: December 1–December 31  
Where: Mayfield Park  
We will sell foods like sausage, chicken, and stew.  
People can drink hot chocolate and watch skating.  
There will be many games, too!  
The festival will be open from 3:00 p.m. to 9:00 p.m. on weekdays and 10:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. on weekends.

questions.question_text: What can people do at the festival?
questions.explanation: 本文に「People can drink hot chocolate and watch skating」と書かれているので、正解は「Drink hot chocolate」です。

questions.question_text: When will the festival close on weekends?
questions.explanation: 本文に「10:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. on weekends」とあるため、週末の閉場時間は8:00 p.m.です。

reading_comprehension.text:
From: Paulina Hartford  
To: Misaki Tanaka  
Date: February 15  
Subject: Help, please  
Hi Misaki,  
I’m taking a Japanese history class now. You did really well in that class when you took it. Can you study with me for my test? We can study something else together, too. Do you need any help with English? Let’s meet at the library on Thursday.  
Thanks,  
Paulina

-

From: Misaki Tanaka  
To: Paulina Hartford  
Date: February 16  
Subject: Yes  
Hey Paulina,  
I can meet you after my science club meeting on Thursday, but I need to be home early because my family will have dinner together that evening. Can we study at the coffee shop near my house? It’s really quiet. I’d like your help with my English homework, too. It’s very difficult for me, and I have an exam on Friday.  
See you,  
Misaki

questions.question_text: Why does Paulina want Misaki’s help?
questions.explanation: Paulinaは「You did really well in that class」と書いており、Misakiがその授業でよい成績を取ったから助けてほしいのです。

choices.choice_text: Misaki did well in a class.

questions.question_text: Why does Misaki need to be home early on Thursday?
questions.explanation: Misakiは「my family will have dinner together that evening」と書いています。

choices.choice_text: To go shopping with her mother.
To have dinner with her family.

questions.question_text: Where does Misaki want to study?
questions.explanation: Misakiは「Can we study at the coffee shop near my house?」と提案しています。

reading_comprehension.text:
An Artist’s Dream  
Daniel always liked art. He wanted to be an artist one day, and his father said, “You should study very hard.” Daniel listened to his father, and he studied every day in his room after school to get good grades.  
One day, Daniel decided to take part in an art contest at a famous art college. Every year, the winner of the contest gets money as a prize, and three teachers at the college choose the winner. Many people took part in the contest, so Daniel was nervous. He painted a picture of his house for the contest.  
The teachers needed four weeks to choose a winner. In the end, Daniel won the contest! When he told his parents, they were surprised but very happy. His father said, “Because you love art, you can take art lessons.” Daniel was excited to begin taking art lessons. Now, he takes two art lessons a week.

questions.question_text: What did Daniel do every day after school?
questions.explanation: 本文に「he studied every day in his room after school」とあります。

questions.question_text: Why was Daniel nervous about the contest?
questions.explanation: 「Many people took part in the contest, so Daniel was nervous」と書かれています。

choices.choice_text: It was at his high school.
Many people took part in it.
A famous artist chose the winner.

questions.question_text: What did Daniel paint for the contest?
questions.explanation: 「He painted a picture of his house for the contest」と書かれています。

questions.question_text: How long did the teachers need to choose the winner?
questions.explanation: 「The teachers needed four weeks to choose a winner」と書かれています。

questions.question_text: After the contest, Daniel was excited to
questions.explanation: 「Daniel was excited to begin taking art lessons」と書かれています。
